basics.name: Justin Sumiye
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a sophomore studying Computer Science (Security Science) in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

highlights: Saved average webpage load speed by 40% using Divi page caching.
Developed a user-friendly PHP web application to automate the creation of decision letters for student applicants using the FPDF PHP library.
Created a trivia quiz for the Korean Culture Day event using React and Material UI played by over 100 students.

awards.title: Student of the Year Nominee
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Manoa Career Center
awards.summary: Nominated out of hundreds of student employees for outstanding performance and dedication. Recognized for "navigating website management tools to update content and implement user-friendly features" and "enhancing website accessibility for students and faculty."

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.6.

awards.title: AP Scholar with Honor
awards.summary: Granted to students who receive an average score of at least 3.25 on all AP Exams taken, and scores of 3 or higher on four or more of these exams.

awards.title: Outstanding Student in AP Computer Science A
